pullRequest.title: [smaenergymeter] Add per-phase channels
pullRequest.bodyText:
SMA Energy Meter Enhancements
Added per-phase (L1, L2, L3) Things.
Adjusted for updated record format for >= 2.03.4.R meters (firmware since 2018) (+8b buffer size)
Reference: http://www.eb-systeme.de/?page_id=3005
#5919

commit.message:
Signed-off-by: Christian Uebber <ntnkbtce2km@temp.mailbox.org>

Added per-phase signals

Signed-off-by: Christian Uebber <ntnkbtce2km@temp.mailbox.org>

beforeCommit.message:

commit.message:
Fixed formatting violations.

Signed-off-by: Christian Uebber <ntnkbtce2km@temp.mailbox.org>

nodes.bodyText:
It's not needed to create new channel-types, because the channel-types are the same as the orignal onces, except for the title. So it's better to remove all all the newly added channel types and define the channels as follows:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			<channel id="powerInL1" typeId="powerInTypeL1"/>
          
          
            
            			<channel id="powerInL1" typeId="powerInType">
          
          
            
            			    <label>Purchased Power L1</label>
          
          
            
            			</channel>
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -12,6 +12,18 @@
 			<channel id="powerOut" typeId="powerOutType"/>
 			<channel id="energyIn" typeId="energyInType"/>
 			<channel id="energyOut" typeId="energyOutType"/>
+			<channel id="powerInL1" typeId="powerInTypeL1"/>

nodes.bodyText:
Since this list has become much longer it's probably better to make this a markdown table (which is done in most other binding documentation)
| Channel | Description                   |
|---------|-------------------------------|
| powerIn | Purchased power [W] |
....

You can format the table with: http://markdowntable.com/

There is an empty first column?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            |   | Channel     | Description            |
          
          
            
            |---|-------------|------------------------|
          
          
            
            |   | powerIn     | Purchased power        |
          
          
            
            |   | powerInL1   | Purchased power L3     |
          
          
            
            |   | powerInL2   | Purchased power L2     |
          
          
            
            |   | powerInL3   | Purchased power L3     |
          
          
            
            |   | powerOut    | Grid feed-in power     |
          
          
            
            |   | powerOutL1  | Grid feed-in power L1  |
          
          
            
            |   | powerOutL2  | Grid feed-in power L2  |
          
          
            
            |   | powerOutL3  | Grid feed-in power L3  |
          
          
            
            |   | energyIn    | Purchased energy       |
          
          
            
            |   | energyInL1  | Purchased energy L1    |
          
          
            
            |   | energyInL2  | Purchased energy L2    |
          
          
            
            |   | energyInL3  | Purchased energy L3    |
          
          
            
            |   | energyOut   | Grid feed-in energy    |
          
          
            
            |   | energyOutL1 | Grid feed-in energy L1 |
          
          
            
            |   | energyOutL2 | Grid feed-in energy L2 |
          
          
            
            |   | energyOutL3 | Grid feed-in energy L3 |
          
          
            
            | Channel     | Description            |
          
          
            
            |-------------|------------------------|
          
          
            
            | powerIn     | Purchased power        |
          
          
            
            | powerInL1   | Purchased power L3     |
          
          
            
            | powerInL2   | Purchased power L2     |
          
          
            
            | powerInL3   | Purchased power L3     |
          
          
            
            | powerOut    | Grid feed-in power     |
          
          
            
            | powerOutL1  | Grid feed-in power L1  |
          
          
            
            | powerOutL2  | Grid feed-in power L2  |
          
          
            
            | powerOutL3  | Grid feed-in power L3  |
          
          
            
            | energyIn    | Purchased energy       |
          
          
            
            | energyInL1  | Purchased energy L1    |
          
          
            
            | energyInL2  | Purchased energy L2    |
          
          
            
            | energyInL3  | Purchased energy L3    |
          
          
            
            | energyOut   | Grid feed-in energy    |
          
          
            
            | energyOutL1 | Grid feed-in energy L1 |
          
          
            
            | energyOutL2 | Grid feed-in energy L2 |

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -22,10 +22,24 @@ Optionally, a refresh interval (in seconds) can be defined.
 
 ## Channels
 
--   **powerIn** Purchased power [W]
--   **powerOut** Grid feed-in power [W]
--   **energyIn** Purchased energy [kWh]
--   **energyOut** Grid feed-in energy [kWh]
